stories.text:
Zero trust is such a buzzword and overused but it really is "a good idea". This video is an overview of some zero trust concepts as well as demonstrating the power of embedding these zero trust ideas directly into the applications you write (and it's easy to do). Check it out.

Video at: https://youtu.be/IPi2BxyIM8s

Come join the project! Give us a star and help us spread the word to the world about application embedded zero trust http://github.com/openziti/ziti
stories.title: What is Application Embedded Zero Trust? (open source project)
